name: SpaceShot
description: SpaceShot - a complex arcade game in which you must destroy the alien invaders and collect bonuses. Three game modes, fast gameplay and a lot of achievements are waiting for you.
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft速 Windows速 XP / Vista / 7 / 10 Processor: 1.4GHz or faster Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: Pixel Shader 3.0, Vertex Shader 3.0 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Microsoft速 Windows速 XP / Vista / 7 / 10 Processor: 2.4GHz or faster Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Pixel Shader 3.0, Vertex Shader 3.0 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 500 MB available space
